meanings.definition: The state or quality of being silent.
meanings.sent1: The silentnesses of the library made it a peaceful place to study.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the silentnesses of nature when I go hiking in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The silentnesses of the classroom were suddenly broken by a loud sneeze.
meanings.sent4: Her silentnesses during the meeting spoke volumes about her disapproval.
meanings.sent5: The silentnesses of the night enveloped the city in a calming embrace.

meanings.definition: The absence of sound or noise.
meanings.sent1: The silentnesses in the room made it feel eerie and unsettling.
meanings.sent2: The silentnesses of the desert at night are almost deafening.
meanings.sent3: The sudden silentnesses in the busy market caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: The silentnesses of the abandoned house were hauntingly oppressive.
meanings.sent5: The silentnesses of the empty street echoed with loneliness.
